item.title: US cities cap Pride Month with a mix of party and protest

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Saturday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Saturday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 04-35-43-52-62, Powerball: 12

item.title: After decades in the US, Iranians arrested in Trump’s deportation drive
item.description: Some Iranians are getting arrested by immigration authorities after living decades in the United States

item.title: Officials believe young shark bit a woman at a New York beach
item.description: Park officials say a 20-year-old woman was likely bitten by a juvenile shark.
